mapper.select: SELECT t1.team_users_id , t1.name , t1.last_tasks_id , t0.course_name , t0.lesson_name , t0.chapter_name , t2.chapter_last_access_datetime FROM tasks t0 INNER JOIN ( SELECT tutp.email_address , tu.name , tu.id as team_users_id , max(t.id) as last_tasks_id FROM team_user_task_progress tutp LEFT JOIN tasks t ON tutp.chapter_id = t.chapter_id LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tutp.email_address = tu.email_address GROUP BY tutp.email_address ) t1 ON t0.id = t1.last_tasks_id INNER JOIN team_user_task_progress t2 ON t1.last_tasks_id = t2.id ;
